title: The Terrible tales of Mr. Bean
brief_description: Two outrageous episodes from the popular television series starring Rowan Atkinson. “The Trouble With Mr Bean”: Mr Bean visits the dentist with dire results, and has a run-in with a particularly insistent wasp. “Mr Bean Rides Again”: When a man has a heart-attack waiting at a bus stop, Mr Bean has no recourse but to jump-start him from a near-by lamp post.
